Library: Friends of Mount Prospect Public Library
SaleDetails:
July 20 - 21
  •  Giant Summer Sale 
  • 3 Room Sale!
    • Better and AV Room
    • Friend's Room
    • Large selection of $0.25 merchandise outside in the lower level garage
  • HOURS for 2024
  • July 20 & 21
    • Saturday 9 am to 4:30 pm
    • Sunday 11 am to 4 pm
      • (No Friday Pre-Sale)
  • 25,000 Books!
    • 95% donated by local residents; 50% hardcover. 20% children's
    • Not 'picked over'; no buyer restrictions
  • Great Prices: Most .25-$1; Best as marked $2-$10, Rare/autographed higher
  • July 2024 Highlights
    • Check out our new area in the Better Room-The Gold Mine.
    • Be a Mount Prospector! Mine the perfect gem, that awesomely cool find you didn't know you really wanted. Fun items, vintage, best condition, specialized collections, coloring books, rare and quirky books, games, puzzles, AV, adult books, white elephant gifts.
    • Most merchandise is new every sale
    • Priced $1.00 and up
  • July Sale Featured Items
    • 100+  Railroading Books and Schedules in like-new condition
    • 400+ Late 2023 and 2024 novels
    • Library used kids' science lab equipment
    • 400+ DVDs and Blu-Rays sealed in original shrink wrap. Kids and adult. Single movie, multiple movie and TV seasons. $2 and up
  • All books over $0.25: Nonfiction books are categorized. Fiction books are categorized and alphabetized.
  •  LPs, puzzles and games too!
  • Large selection of world language books.
  • No magazines, books on tape, cassettes, VHS or software.
  • Scanners are welcome. Please reshelve unwanted books.
  • Plenty of free parking
  • Handcarts available
  • Credit cards accepted. There is a $2 convenience fee for charges under $100. $5 fee for charges from $100 to under $250. $8 for charges of $250 or more.
  • Please visit our website for Friends news and more. Sign up to receive our newsletter. http://www.friendsofmppl.org
  • More information will be available at the sale.
